name: HyperPunch
description:
My submission for score space jam:

SuperHot style bullet hell where need to escape the room you are in. To get more points, you should punch the bee enemy but you have to be very close. 

Credits:

https://www.youtube.com/c/AlexandrZhelanovsMusic

All the other assets are my creation.
